meanings.definition: The act of turning a story or screenplay into a novel.
meanings.sent1: The novelization of the movie brought the story to life in book form.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading novelizations of my favorite films to experience the story in a different way.
meanings.sent3: The novelization of the play turned the characters into words on a page, quite a transformation!
meanings.sent4: Her novelization of the script was so vivid, it felt like the characters jumped off the pages.
meanings.sent5: The novelization captured the essence of the film, making it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A novel based on a previously existing story or screenplay.
meanings.sent1: The novelization of the TV series was a hit among fans of the show.
meanings.sent2: I bought the novelization of the game to delve deeper into the characters' backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: Reading the novelization felt like revisiting an old friend from a different perspective.
meanings.sent4: The novelization added layers to the original story, making it richer and more engaging.
meanings.sent5: The novelization expanded on the movie's universe, creating a whole new experience for readers.
